name: Another Day (Text Adventure v.01a)
description:
Another class project, that is going to be in development (Just like my other project). Fonts, and music used in my project were made by other talented people and links below on where to get them. This "update" just contains some tweaks to some visual content (mainly for "troll"), and new text for the random range troll fight.

Links:

https://www.freesound.org/people/frankum/sounds/317366/ "Piano" (Song used)

http://www.dafont.com/pixtall.font Pixel font

http://www.flashkit.com/fonts/D/Dynomite-Font-a-l-454/index.php "Dynomite" font
